choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds
### Assistant:

Here is your daily menu, please let me know if there are any changes you would like to make. 

Breakfast : 1 cup of oatmeal with blueberries and walnuts; 2 slices whole wheat toast with avocado spread ; coffee or tea 
Lunch : 3 oz chicken breast, steamed broccoli, brown rice 
Snack: apple, carrot sticks  
Dinner : 4 oz salmon filet cooked in foil packet on the grill topped with lemon juice and dill sprigs; 1 cup of quinoa mixed with chopped bell peppers (red, orange & yellow), corn kernels, black beans ; steamed broccoli 

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
